trans-unit.source: How to make a phone call from Twilio (.NET) | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: How to make a phone call from Twilio (.NET) | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to make a phone call and send a SMS message with the Twilio API service on Azure.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to make a phone call and send a SMS message with the Twilio API service on Azure.

trans-unit.source: Code samples written in .NET.
trans-unit.target: Code samples written in .NET.

trans-unit.source: How to make a phone call using Twilio in a web role on Azure
trans-unit.target: How to make a phone call using Twilio in a web role on Azure

trans-unit.source: This guide demonstrates how to use Twilio to make a call from a web page hosted in Azure.
trans-unit.target: This guide demonstrates how to use Twilio to make a call from a web page hosted in Azure.

trans-unit.source: The resulting application prompts the user for phone call values, as shown in the following screenshot.
trans-unit.target: The resulting application prompts the user for phone call values, as shown in the following screenshot.

trans-unit.source: Azure call form using Twilio and ASP.NET
trans-unit.target: Azure call form using Twilio and ASP.NET

trans-unit.source: Prerequisites
trans-unit.target: Prerequisites

trans-unit.source: You will need to do the following to use the code in this topic:
trans-unit.target: You will need to do the following to use the code in this topic:

trans-unit.source: Acquire a Twilio account and authentication token.
trans-unit.target: Acquire a Twilio account and authentication token.

trans-unit.source: To get started with Twilio, sign up at [https://www.twilio.com/try-twilio][try_twilio].
trans-unit.target: To get started with Twilio, sign up at [https://www.twilio.com/try-twilio][try_twilio].

trans-unit.source: You can evaluate pricing at [http://www.twilio.com/pricing][twilio_pricing].
trans-unit.target: You can evaluate pricing at [http://www.twilio.com/pricing][twilio_pricing].

trans-unit.source: For information about the API provided by Twilio, see [http://www.twilio.com/voice/api][twilio_api].
trans-unit.target: For information about the API provided by Twilio, see [http://www.twilio.com/voice/api][twilio_api].

trans-unit.source: Add the Twilio .NET libary to your web role.
trans-unit.target: Add the Twilio .NET libary to your web role.

trans-unit.source: See "To add the Twilio libraries to your web role project," later in this topic.
trans-unit.target: See "To add the Twilio libraries to your web role project," later in this topic.

trans-unit.source: You should be familiar with creating a basic web role on Azure.
trans-unit.target: You should be familiar with creating a basic web role on Azure.

trans-unit.source: How to: Create a web form for making a call
trans-unit.target: How to: Create a web form for making a call

trans-unit.source: To add the Twilio libraries to your web role project:
trans-unit.target: To add the Twilio libraries to your web role project:

trans-unit.source: Open your solution in Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: Open your solution in Visual Studio.

trans-unit.source: Right-click **References**.
trans-unit.target: Right-click **References**.

trans-unit.source: Click **Manage NuGet Packages**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Manage NuGet Packages**.

trans-unit.source: Click **Online**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Online**.

trans-unit.source: In the search online box, type *twilio*.
trans-unit.target: In the search online box, type *twilio*.

trans-unit.source: Click **Install** on the Twilio package.
trans-unit.target: Click **Install** on the Twilio package.

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to create a web form to retrieve user data for making a call.
trans-unit.target: The following code shows how to create a web form to retrieve user data for making a call.

trans-unit.source: In this example, an ASP.NET web role named **TwilioCloud** is created.
trans-unit.target: In this example, an ASP.NET web role named **TwilioCloud** is created.

trans-unit.source: How to: Create the code to make the call
trans-unit.target: How to: Create the code to make the call

trans-unit.source: The following code, which is called when the user completes the form, creates the call message and generates the call.
trans-unit.target: The following code, which is called when the user completes the form, creates the call message and generates the call.

trans-unit.source: In this example, the code is run in the onclick event handler of the button on the form.
trans-unit.target: In this example, the code is run in the onclick event handler of the button on the form.

trans-unit.source: (Use your Twilio account and authentication token instead of the placeholder values assigned to **accountSID** and **authToken** in the code below.)
trans-unit.target: (Use your Twilio account and authentication token instead of the placeholder values assigned to **accountSID** and **authToken** in the code below.)

trans-unit.source: The call is made, and the Twilio endpoint, API version, and the call status are displayed.
trans-unit.target: The call is made, and the Twilio endpoint, API version, and the call status are displayed.

trans-unit.source: The following screenshot shows output from a sample run.
trans-unit.target: The following screenshot shows output from a sample run.

trans-unit.source: Azure call response using Twilio and ASP.NET
trans-unit.target: Azure call response using Twilio and ASP.NET

trans-unit.source: More information about TwiML can be found at [http://www.twilio.com/docs/api/twiml][twiml].
trans-unit.target: More information about TwiML can be found at [http://www.twilio.com/docs/api/twiml][twiml].

trans-unit.source: More information about <Say> and other Twilio verbs can be found at [http://www.twilio.com/docs/api/twiml/say][twilio_say].
trans-unit.target: More information about <Say> and other Twilio verbs can be found at [http://www.twilio.com/docs/api/twiml/say][twilio_say].

trans-unit.source: Next steps
trans-unit.target: Next steps

trans-unit.source: This code was provided to show you basic functionality using Twilio in an ASP.NET web role on Azure.
trans-unit.target: This code was provided to show you basic functionality using Twilio in an ASP.NET web role on Azure.

trans-unit.source: Before deploying to Azure in production, you may want to add more error handling or other features.
trans-unit.target: Before deploying to Azure in production, you may want to add more error handling or other features.

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: For example:

trans-unit.source: Instead of using a web form, you could use Azure Blob storage or an Azure SQL Database instance to store phone numbers and call text.
trans-unit.target: Instead of using a web form, you could use Azure Blob storage or an Azure SQL Database instance to store phone numbers and call text.

trans-unit.source: For information about using blobs in Azure, see [How to use the Azure Blob storage service in .NET][howto_blob_storage_dotnet].
trans-unit.target: For information about using blobs in Azure, see [How to use the Azure Blob storage service in .NET][howto_blob_storage_dotnet].

trans-unit.source: For information about using SQL Database, see [How to use Azure SQL Database in .NET applications][howto_sql_azure_dotnet].
trans-unit.target: For information about using SQL Database, see [How to use Azure SQL Database in .NET applications][howto_sql_azure_dotnet].

trans-unit.source: You could use RoleEnvironment.getConfigurationSettings to retrieve the Twilio account ID and authentication token from your deployment's configuration settings, instead of hard-coding the values in your form.
trans-unit.target: You could use RoleEnvironment.getConfigurationSettings to retrieve the Twilio account ID and authentication token from your deployment's configuration settings, instead of hard-coding the values in your form.

trans-unit.source: For information about the RoleEnvironment class, see [Microsoft.WindowsAzure.ServiceRuntime Namespace][azure_runtime_ref_dotnet].
trans-unit.target: For information about the RoleEnvironment class, see [Microsoft.WindowsAzure.ServiceRuntime Namespace][azure_runtime_ref_dotnet].

trans-unit.source: Read the Twilio security guidelines at [https://www.twilio.com/docs/security][twilio_docs_security].
trans-unit.target: Read the Twilio security guidelines at [https://www.twilio.com/docs/security][twilio_docs_security].

trans-unit.source: Learn more about Twilio at [https://www.twilio.com/docs][twilio_docs].
trans-unit.target: Learn more about Twilio at [https://www.twilio.com/docs][twilio_docs].
